reviews.text: The food is consistent. They are always friendly.

UPDATE 10/21/25: Ok sorry at one time there Chinese food is the best but not no more I believe there probably have a new team. The portion are small the dumplings and wontons taste spoiled.
But to fast forward I think the only thing that taste good is the usual order Chicken wings with French fries.
Im 48 now this is the only surviving place and restaurant that is still standing but how the food is now......no comment on that part I hope there approved because this place is part of my childhood.

July 20 2025 food is delicious for pick up only no delivery fresh and always good I only buy here

Oct 2025 the food is delicious we come to get often since the other owner was here they are very polite and food always warm
food was okay. Nothing special. Saw a homeless woman begging and that made me very uncomfortable.
Didn't spend much but super satisfied you can't get this in my new state native New Yorker üëçüëçüëçüòÅ
Best Chinese in the area

In my opinion this is one of the best Chinese Restaurants.   I had worked near it before & it was a go to for lunch.  The food is very good and the place is very clean.  Although I no longer work in the area, I will travel from a distant area in the Bronx to this restaurant.   I have never eaten from this restaurant & gotten an upset stomach.   The Chinese Restaurants in the area where I live, I have gotten an upset stomach from eating from them.  Once is enough, I don't go to the ones in my neighborhood, period.  So if you are in the area of Yankee Stadium,  it is 1 block east of them on Gerard Avenue.  üëç

They didn't have the long bone spare ribs that i wanted but I got the small rib tips.  I love the crunchy end of the ribs but its not like the actual long bone with all the meat.  I'd give it another try if I was in the neighborhood.
It's a great place to eat.. we have like 5 restaurants around that's competing and this one beats them all..
Amazing service amazing food, greet you with a smile on your face chicken wings are always perfect fries, steamed dumplings!

I‚Äôve been coming here 20+ years, and the food never disappoints! It‚Äôs been the same recipe since my childhood memories because the cook has been there that long. Awesome staff and food.
My to go order:
Chicken Broccoli with carrots
Spicy, light on the sauce
Vegetable fried or your choice of rice
Sometimes crispy fries
Never fails to get lunch or dinner down the block
Enjoy!
Best Chinese food in the area. They don‚Äôt deliver so I walk about 3-4 blocks just for this. Fresh wings and everything on the menu is delicious. They‚Äôre fast too worth the walk
Best Chinese food in the Bronx
28 years and the food still amazing!

Been going there for years, The food is very tasty and well made and the service is friendly and fast.

I wish they upgraded and got with the times. They don't take card and they don't deliver.

They are not even on uber or doordash and I can't understand why.
Solid place near Yankee Stadium to get some grub.
Always good eats here!
Very tasty stuff. Generous pork fried rice, and chicken with garlic sauce. Will be trying more. Only down side doesn't deliver.
Great hood Chinese spot
Good food
THE FOOD IS VERY FRESH... DELICIOUS AND THEY HAVE GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE. MY NEW SPOT üòä‚Ä¶
My go to neighbor spot I've been eating here since 75 good Chinese food
best chinese food in the area. only downside it's take out only.
I love their customer service and food! Wish they deliver...
Food is prepped quickly, the store is kept immaculate, and the service is super friendly!
Food taste great. Really they make you come back for more. And the price is right.

I grew up eating from here and it remains the best Chinese food spot for me. Nothing and no where else compares. Friendly staff. My favorite dishes are the beef and broccoli and the house special fried rice.
Staff and owner super friendly. Always smiling, great food, great vibes, clean place. General Tso Chicken is my favorite dish as well as an order of Broccoli with the brown sauce they season it in.
I love the food here! Awesome!
I liked this place
Asectable y muy personalizado en cuanto a la atenci√≥n
Typical Chinese food. Clean.
Very nice people who make good food. Some of it was little greasy, but the rest was good, even very good. I will come back for more. Recommended.
If you like Chinese... pay them a visit

Great food
Gives napkins ketchups forks
Not cheap
Nice people
This is a very great place to eat an the food is the best ever an the worker's are awesome people and the neighborhood loves them please eat here you won't go wrong
My friend and I came in here for a late lunch. We agreed that the food was excellent given the price. I was very pleased that they had brown rice.
no deliveries...unheard of!!!!
Always satisfying
Fast service always answer the phone always get my order correct. I wish they start doing doing delivery
Great food good jumbo shrimp
Incredible. They must be doing something right. I used to go here back in the 1960's.
I love this place, they are clean and friendly
We like the place,  good food, good service.
